discovery.text: Her method: high expectations, Socratic discussion, and classical literature. She treated every child as gifted.

twist.text: Two presidents offered her the position of Secretary of Education. She turned both down to keep teaching children.

climax.text: Collins proved that 'learning disabled' often means 'poorly taught.' When you expect greatness, children deliver it.
